text: The South London line is an Inner London part of the London Overground rail network. The line is run together with the East London line to provide direct services between and Highbury & Islington. The line is long and there are eight stations. Most of the line is on a high viaduct over other transport infrastructure. There is an interchange with London Underground at . The line is in Travelcard Zone 2. title: South London line
